title: Power System Resilience Enhancement Strategy Using Neural Network-Based Distributed Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic power systems theory, linear algebra, and introductory neural network concepts
context.additional_context: Flexible learning schedules and practical case-centered education for working adult learners

learning_goals: Optimal Load Shedding (OLS) strategies can be designed using neural network models in power system emergency scenarios.
A system can be built to reduce real-time computational load by applying distributed learning techniques.
Resilience evaluation methods can be explained through case analyses utilizing IEEE-standard system models.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
